Headline: Data Science | Data Engineering | DevOps
Summary: Tolu started off as a Bioengineer, then he got a Masters in Chemical Engineering from North Carolina State University and a Certificate in Data Science & Analytics from the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill. Tolu is passionate about applying the rigor of all those disciplines to solving real world problems. He possesses 3+ years of experience in industrial and academic data analysis with proven technical and leadership qualities.   Languages & Concepts: Python, R, Javascript, C++, SAS, SQL, Spark, Excel VBA, LAMMPS, Machine Learning, Neural Networks, MapReduce, Aspen Plus, Molecular Simulations, Process simulations, High Performance Computing, Bash and Unix Scripting.  Databases & Applications: Apache Hadoop, Pig, Hive, AWS (EC2, Redshift, Lambda, S3, Sagemaker, RDS), Relational Databases (Postgres, MySQL), Non-relational (MongoDB), SAP  Experimental skills with: Labview, Process Eye, SEM, XRD, TEM, Gas Chromatography, Mass Spectrometry, TGA, HPLC, FTIR.  When he is not behind a keyboard or a reactor, he watches anime, listens to country/jazz music or reads books.
